description: If you love the taste of&nbsp;grapefruit juice, then this is a cocktail that will surely be your next favorite! The mixture of rum, grapefruit juice, and a little lime makes for one amazing drink that is pleasing not only to the eye but to your taste buds as well.
name: Nevada

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Fill it with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Fill it with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain contents into a chilled cocktail glass. You can garnish it with a lime wedge.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain contents into a chilled cocktail glass. You can garnish it with a lime wedge.
